Our Services

We stock different colors of overcaps along with many sizes and variations of cans, valves, and spray tips. Cans may either be regular steel, aluminum, or 2 piece DS container. With the different combinations of valves and spray tips, you can create the spray pattern you desire: ranging from soft like hair spray to a blast spray used for wasp sprays.

FOR SAFETY DATA SHEETS CLICK HERE

Custom Filling

ARI offers complete aerosol formulation and packaging to meet the specific needs of each of our customers.

Private Labeling

We have our own in-house printing operation where we print and die cut your artwork into ready-to-use labels.

Chemical Mixing & Testing

ARI has a complete lab with a full-time chemist who performs quality control on our products.

GHS Compliance

Save time and money with our complimentary GHS services which includes label updates/modification and SDS authoring.

Propellants

We offer a wide range of propellants including propane, isobutane, non-flammable carbon dioxide, nitrogen, and Honeywell’s newest non-flammable 1234ZE.

Packaging

ARI has an annual capacity of thirty million cans with two MBC aerosol rotary indexing filling lines and three indexing aerosol filling lines.

MORE THAN 50 YEARS OF EXCELLENCE

ARI has been a family-run company since 1964 and we care about your business. Stop dealing with the large Wall Street types and create a personal relationship with us instead.

We understand that your success is our success, which is why we create lasting partnerships instead of clients. You are much more than a customer to us and we heavily invest ourselves into your products, ideas, and issues to ensure that your aerosol, chemical, and liquid packaging needs are met to the quality level that you deserve.

ARI participates in the Southern Aerosol Technical Association, keeping us up-to-date on all issues relating to aerosols and the safety of our products.

Let our experts work for you! Contact us today for a quote. Request a Quote
